title: World nuclear power consumption by country 2018
summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share of nuclear power consumption in each Country on the y axis.
The Share of nuclear power consumption is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Japan.
The difference of Share of nuclear power consumption between the highest and lowest Country is 29.6.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share of nuclear power consumption in the y axis.
The Share of nuclear power consumption is appeared to be the highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Japan.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Share of nuclear power consumption in each Country on the y axis.
The Share of nuclear power consumption is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Japan.
The difference of Share of nuclear power consumption between the highest and lowest Country is 29.6.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Share of nuclear power consumption in the y axis.
The Share of nuclear power consumption is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Japan.
The difference of Share of nuclear power consumption between the highest and lowest Country is 29.6.
Country United States is higher than any other Countrys with value 31.4, followed by France, and China. Down to Country Japan with the lowest value 1.8.
The Country Japan has 4.26 times less Share of nuclear power consumption than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 88.5.
